https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iyVFjdvG4CFHV7mwxREx3npOr3V.jpg Uptight city accountant Michael Thompson is hired to help a family save their stable before the bank shuts them down. Michael reluctantly agrees, but as he searches for ways to save a family's legacy, he finds something he never expected. A Horse Tale
